name: Production Planning Report
query:
select
pp.name,
pp.company,
pp.plan_type,
pp.status,
pp.posting_date,
pp.plan_date,
pp.plan_to,
ppi.item_code,
itm.item_name,
ppi.planned_qty
from `tabProduction Plan` as pp
left join `tabProduction Plan Item` as ppi on pp.name=ppi.parent
left join `tabItem` as itm on itm.name=ppi.item_code
where (date(pp.posting_date) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)
